flawed_nl_solution:
Caleb was left with 40 - 3 - 3 - 5 - 2 = <<40-3-3-5-2=30>>30 dandelion puffs to give to his friends.
They each received 30/3 = <<30/3=10>>10 dandelion puffs
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 30. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
